titleStmt.title: A short and plaine discourse Fully containing the vvhole doctrine of euangelicall fastes. By George Buddle, Bachelour of Diuinitie, and parson of Whikkenby in Lincolne-shire.
titleStmt.author: Buddle, George, b. ca. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Windet] for Mathevv Lavv, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, neere vnto Saint Austines Gate, at the signe of the Foxe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, neere vnto Saint Austines Gate, at the signe of the Foxe
